column5: I was woundering if anyone could recommend a good place to buy a 80lb thrust Maxxum Looking to buy one before the spring
Knowing your location would help a little, Bud.
Sorry would have helped I live in Guelph I am willing to drive far if the price is right
I would check out the boat show in January and the Spring Fishing Show in February.  There's even BPS's Spring Fling in March. That would be my plan.  Cheers, Gman
The best place with the best price is in Woodstock at Angling Outfitters. Talk to Jocelyn. He is the man for Minnkota and Lowrance and everything else in his awesome store. (519) 539-5494  JP
